title: Chocolate Curry Bites (Gluten-Free, Vegan, Low-Glycemic, Soy-Free)
directions: milk with the vanilla stevia. Add the remaining ingredients until you have a thick ganache-type mixture. Divide into two mini cupcake cups (I use silicone ones) and freeze for at least 15 minutes. If serving bites after they have been in the freezer overnight or longer, allow to thaw for about half an hour before serving.
ingredients: 1 tsp coconut oil, melted (I love this one from Garden of Life)
1 Tbsp and 1 tsp coconut cream (the thicker creamy part you find in a can of coconut milk)
2 Tbsps raw cacao (I love this one from Navitas)
1/2 tsp gluten-free curry powder (I used Simply Organic Curry)
1 Tbsp shredded coconut and additional shredded coconut for topping
